Layers

Layers can be used to put content in a sequence that can be viewed by swiping left and right. It's great for making image galleries.

  • 1
  • 2
  • 3

Layers can include other dynamic content too (even animations).

  • 1
  • 2

You can also navigate by tapping the left or right half of the layers by adding data-tap="true"
